content.question: In measures 1-4, the vocal melody is embellished with which of the following types of nonharmonic tones?

unit.text: 6: Harmony and Voice Leading III - Embellishments, Motives, and Melodic Devices

topic.text: 6.1: Embellishing Tones - Identifying Passing Tones and Neighbor Tones

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Use symbols and terms to describe features of pitch in notated music, including pitch patterns and relationships, melodic features, chords, harmonic progressions, and cadences.
